code: import{CodeIcon}from"@heroicons/react/solid";import React from"react";import{projects}from"../data";import{AnimationOnScroll}from'react-animation-on-scroll';import"animate.css/animate.min.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Projects(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"projects",className:"text-gray-400 bg-gray-900 body-font",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container px-5 py-10 mx-auto text-center lg:px-40",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col w-full mb-20",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AnimationOnScroll,{initiallyVisible:false,animateIn:"animate__rotateIn",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CodeIcon,{className:"mx-auto inline-block w-10 mb-4"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"sm:text-4xl text-3xl font-medium title-font mb-4 text-white",children:"Projects I've built"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"lg:w-2/3 mx-auto leading-relaxed text-base",children:"Below is a showcase of the projects I've worked on so far that I've found interesting and challenging.
